messages.title: CLIMATE CHANGE
messages.content: To read our complete policies visit www.votefordavyjones4kemptown.org.uk

messages.title: The only way is ethics
messages.content: Only Green policies take into account the needs and rights of the planet as well as people.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Green Party is the only party committed to fighting climate change and ensuring we hand on a safe climate to our kids and grandkids.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Green Party is the only party capable of winning Brighton Kemptown from Labour.

issues.economy: The Green Party is the only party genuinely committed to fighting climate change and to ensuring we hand on a safe climate to our kids and grandkids.
issues.environment: The Green Party is the only party committed to fighting climate change and ensuring we hand on a safe climate to our kids and grandkids.

leaflet.personalStatement: This is the most exciting election for a generation. It matters to all of us.

quotes.text: The Green Party is the only party genuinely committed to fighting climate change and to ensuring we hand on a safe climate to our kids and grandkids.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet focuses on policy regarding climate change, promoting the Green Party as the only choice for ensuring a safe climate for future generations. The Green Party is suggested as the alternative party capable of winning Brighton Kemptown from Labour. The election date is mentioned as May 2010, and there's a push for the ethical stance of Green policies considering both planetary and human needs.
